name: godo-workspace
description: Event discovery app workspace with containerized development environment

scripts.services:up: docker-compose up -d supabase-db supabase-api inbucket redis
scripts.backend:migrate: docker-compose exec godo-backend python -c 'from app.database import execute_schema; execute_schema()'
scripts.expo:start: docker-compose exec godo-dev bash -c 'cd godo-app && npx expo start --tunnel'
scripts.expo:install: docker-compose exec godo-dev bash -c 'cd godo-app && npx expo install'
scripts.expo:typecheck: docker-compose exec godo-dev bash -c 'cd godo-app && npx tsc --noEmit'
scripts.expo:lint: docker-compose exec godo-dev bash -c 'cd godo-app && npx eslint src/'
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down supabase-db && docker volume rm godo_postgres-data && docker-compose up -d supabase-db
scripts.health: docker-compose ps && docker-compose exec godo-dev node --version && docker-compose exec godo-dev expo --version

author: Godo Team
